### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_internal_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    internal_data VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_external_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    external_data VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reconciliation_type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE reconciliation_internal_data SET internal_data = 'Updated internal data' WHERE id = 1;
